metadata.name: Golden Token: City 8 1/999
metadata.description:
**[CryptoCitizens](https://opensea.io/collection/cryptocitizensofficial) | [Roadmap](https://www.brightmoments.io/) | [Discord](https://discord.gg/brightmoments)**

A Golden Token City 8 (GTC8) NFT provides the holder with a claim to mint 1 of 1,000 City 8 CryptoCitizen NFTs through an IRL-only mint experience. City 8 will be in Asia Pacific (i.e Tokyo, Taipei, or Sydney) in Summer 2023 and voted on by CryptoCitizen holders in Winter 2022.
